definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: with advers. force, only, nevertheless (der. uncertain: Nö:M 202 = [[מָא]] + [[בָּר]], lit. except what: Targum [[בְּרַם]] oft. for [[אַח]], [[אוּלָם]]; Syr. bram Ex 9:16, Ex 21:21, and in NT for plh/n; Chr-Pal. brn, bryn);—Da 2:28, Da 4:12 hew down the tree etc., [[שְׁבֻקוּ]]…[[בְּרַם]]: only leave the stump, etc., v:Da 4:20, Da 5:17, Ezr 5:13.
